definition: opposite/contrary
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Lincoln, in contrast, is sui generis.
sentences.chinese: 相反，林肯则是独一无二的。

sentences.english: In June the equatorial trade winds reversed direction from westward to eastward.
sentences.chinese: 六月赤道信风相反的方向从西到东。

sentences.english: Instead, by mixing primary colors, all other colors can be generated.
sentences.chinese: 相反，通过混合三原色，可以生成其他所有的颜色。

sentences.english: In Hackney, by contrast, more people are both working and staying.
sentences.chinese: 与之相反，在哈克尼市，更多的人工作并定居于此。
相反，犹他最近13场却输了10场。

sentences.english: Instead, you're taking advantage of the tight cohesion the fixture displays.
sentences.chinese: 相反，您充分利用了该装置显示的严密内聚性。

sentences.english: Instead, they honored him, by adopting the breed as the official firehouse mascot.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们尊敬它，用它来作为消防队的正式吉祥物。

sentences.english: Conversely, it will also upshift when engine revs are too high.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，当引擎转速过高时，系统不允许升档。

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交际法有，过于恰恰相反注重语言在语境中的运用。

sentences.english: The ailerons are moved in opposite senses to make the plane roll.
sentences.chinese: 副翼向相反的方向转动就会使得飞机翻滚。

sentences.english: Letting tax cheats run wild doesn’t exactly serve the cause of deficit reduction.
sentences.chinese: 让骗税泛滥与削减赤字的努力作用刚好相反。

sentences.english: Instead, I say piously that all I want are three things.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我很虔诚的说，我追求的只有三件事。

sentences.english: Death: for Syria is not a penalty, on the contrary is an accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 死，对于亚斯兰并非是一种惩罚，相反是一种成全。

sentences.english: Conversely, Protestants often interpret the Old Testament scriptures more literally than Catholics.
sentences.chinese: 相反，新教教徒往往用更为书面的语言解释圣经旧约。

sentences.english: But in the sandy land, the change tendency of the soil moisture content is opposite to the clay land.
sentences.chinese: 而在沙土地，土壤含水量的变化趋势与黏土地相反。

definition: instead/on the contrary/contrary (to expectations)
on the other hand.../conversely...
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
but on the contrary/but expectedly
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
thus/consequently/as a result
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
for the same reason
Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
because/owing to/on account of
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
if/in case/in the event that
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
but/however
